itemLocation.linkage: file://\\gvrdfile01\gis\GISDATA\PROJECTS\CP11\00\Regional Growth Strategy\Land Use Designation Maps\RGS Land Use Designations Master.gdb

copy.source: R:\04 - Land Use Policy\Data\TZ Data (Coriolis project)\Vancouver\Cambie Corridor Phase 2_region

lineage.Process: CalculateField "Vancouver_Cambie Corridor Phase 2_and_FTDA" Muni "City of Vancouver" VB #
CalculateField "Vancouver_Cambie Corridor Phase 2_and_FTDA" MUNI "City of Vancouver" VB #
CalculateField "Vancouver_Cambie Corridor Phase 2_and_FTDA" NAME "Cambie Corridor (south of 16th Ave.)" VB #

Merge 'Vancouver_Cambie Corridor Phase 2_and_FTDA';Surrey_Proposed_FTDAs;LangleyTownship_Carvolth_FTDA;DNV_FTDAs;Coquitlam_FTDA_Burquitlam L:\GIS\ArcView\Basedata\RGS\FTDAs\MV_FTDAs.shp "MUNI "MUNI" true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Vancouver_Cambie Corridor Phase 2_and_FTDA,MUNI,-1,-1,Surrey_Proposed_FTDAs,MUNI,-1,-1,LangleyTownship_Carvolth_FTDA,MUNI,-1,-1,DNV_FTDAs,MUNI,-1,-1,Coquitlam_FTDA_Burquitlam,MUNI,-1,-1;NAME "NAME" true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Vancouver_Cambie Corridor Phase 2_and_FTDA,NAME,-1,-1,Surrey_Proposed_FTDAs,NAME,-1,-1,LangleyTownship_Carvolth_FTDA,NAME,-1,-1,DNV_FTDAs,NAME,-1,-1,Coquitlam_FTDA_Burquitlam,NAME,-1,-1"
CalculateField MV_FTDAs OnFTN "No" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs OnFTN "Yes" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs Type "Rail" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs Type "Bus" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs STATUS "RCS accepted by Metro Vancouver Board on July 26, 2013" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs STATUS "Identified in 2011 Official Community Plan. RCS has not yet been resubmitted for acceptance by the Metro Vancouver Board under the new Regional Growth Strategy" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs STATUS "Municipal public hearing held on RCS in July 2013. Regional Context Statement forwarded to Metro Vancouver Board for acceptance" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs STATUS "RCS went to Surrey Council on July 22nd, 2013. Not yet accepted by the Metro Vancouver Board" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs STATUS "Received 3rd reading by Council on July 22nd, 2013. Council submitted RCS to Metro Vancouver Board for acceptance. Not yet accepted by Metro Vancouver Board" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs NAME "Lower Lynn" VB #
CalculateField MV_FTDAs NAME "Lower Capilano-Marine" VB #
CalculateField FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013 Status_1 "Accepted" VB #
CalculateField FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013 Status_1 "Proposed" VB #

FeatureClassToFeatureClass "Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013" "Z:\Regional Growth Strategy\Land Use Designation Maps" FTDAs_RCS.shp # "MUNI "MUNI" true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,MUNI,-1,-1;NAME "NAME" true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,NAME,-1,-1;OnFTN "OnFTN" true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,OnFTN,-1,-1;Type "Type" true true false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,Type,-1,-1;STATUS "STATUS" true true false 254 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,STATUS,-1,-1;Shape_Leng "Shape_Length" false true true 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,Shape_Length,-1,-1;Shape_Area "Shape_Area" false true true 8 Double 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,Shape_Area,-1,-1;Status_1 "Status_1" true true false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,Z:\BASE_DATA\Regional Growth Strategy.gdb\FTDA_Proposed\FTDAs_RCSs_to_Nov15_2013,Status_1,-1,-1" #
